DBStats.LearnMore: To learn more about how Piwik processes data and how to make Piwik work well with medium and high traffic websites, see this documentation: %s.
DBStats.MainDescription: Piwik stores all your web analytics data in a MySQL database. Currently, Piwik tables take up %s of space.
DBStats.PluginDescription: Provides detailed MySQL database usage reports. Available for Super Users under Diagnostics.
